welcome.title: Welcome to Hov Hyttegrend
welcome.description: A true nature experience in the heart of Norway

section_1.title: Hov Hyttegrend - a small piece of authentic Norway
section_1.text:
Welcome to a place where nature feels closer, the silence is deeper, and everyday life is farther away than ever.
At Hov Hyttegrend, you stay in the heart of a peaceful and beautiful natural landscape, surrounded by forests, mountains, rivers, and lakes.
Here you can experience the very best of Norwegian nature and outdoor life – perfect for adventure seekers, families, couples, and groups of friends looking for a genuine and tranquil getaway.

section_2.title: About Us
section_2.text:
Hov Hyttegrend is a small and peaceful cabin community in the heart of beautiful Fjord Norway — surrounded by mountains, waterfalls, fjords, and glaciers.
Here you have the perfect starting point to experience some of the finest nature Vestland has to offer.
We are located right next to the protected Gaular Watercourse, renowned for its many waterfalls, rapids, and tranquil mountain lakes. The river winds its way through the landscape, offering both breathtaking nature experiences and excellent fishing opportunities.

section_3.title: Active Outdoor Life
section_3.text: The area surrounding the cabins is ideal for those who want to stay active and enjoy the outdoors.

section_4.title: Sightseeing – Food – Shopping
section_4.text: Experience and shopping in the local area

section_5.title: Why Choose Us?
section_5.text:
Short local walks and grand natural scenery in one single stay.
A family-friendly and welcoming atmosphere.
Perfect for couples, families, and nature lovers.
Peace, tranquility, and authentic West Coast nature without the crowds.

section_6.title: Accommodation in a Natural Idyll
section_6.text: At Hov Hyttegrend we offer simple yet comfortable accommodation in cabins, as well as pitches for motorhomes and caravans. Here, you stay close to nature, with birdsong and the gentle sound of the river as your background music.
section_6.listItem2: Beautiful surroundings and generous space between units
section_6.listItem3: Walking distance to hiking trails and fishing lakes

termsPage.title: Terms and Conditions – Cabin Rental and Campsite
termsPage.description: Applies to all bookings with HOV-HYTTEGREND AS – org. no. 935 623 642 VAT

part_1.title: 1. Booking and Confirmation
part_1.text: Bookings can be made via our website, by phone, or by email. A booking is binding once you have received a written confirmation from us. The customer is responsible for ensuring that the provided contact details are correct.

part_2.title: 2. Payment
part_2.listItem1: An invoice is issued after booking or upon arrival, depending on agreement.
part_2.listItem2: Payment due date: 14 days from the invoice date, or prior to arrival if the stay is imminent.
part_2.listItem3: Late payment will incur interest on overdue amounts and reminder fees.

part_3.title: 3. Prices
part_3.text: All prices are stated in Norwegian kroner (NOK) and include value added tax (VAT). Prices include electricity and normal firewood consumption unless otherwise agreed.

part_4.title: 4. Cancellation – Different Price Categories
part_4.listItem1: More than 1 day before arrival: Fully Flexible
part_4.listItem2: Less than 30 days before arrival: Non-refundable
part_4.text: In cases of illness or force majeure, exceptions may be made subject to documentation and individual assessment.

part_5.title: 5. Check-in and Check-out
part_5.listItem2: Check-out: no later than 11:00 AM on the day of departure
part_5.text: Late check-out must be agreed in advance and may incur an additional fee.

part_6.title: 6. Cleaning and Order
part_6.text1: The cabin must be left in a tidy condition. Final cleaning is not included unless agreed and paid for in advance. If the cabin is not satisfactorily cleaned upon check-out, an additional cleaning fee will be charged.
part_6.text2: Alternative: We offer final cleaning for an additional fee.

part_7.title: 7. Keys and Access
part_7.text: Keys are provided at check-in and must be returned at check-out. Loss of keys will incur a fee of NOK 500 for replacement of locks or keys.

part_8.title: 8. Damage and Liability
part_8.text: The customer is financially responsible for any damage to furniture, property, or buildings caused by negligence or violation of the rules. Any damage must be reported immediately. Smoking is not permitted indoors. Pets are allowed in selected cabins for an additional fee.

part_9.title: 9. Force Majeure
part_9.text: We are not responsible for circumstances beyond our control, such as extreme weather, power outages, road closures, or similar events that make it impossible to carry out the stay as planned.

part_10.title: 10. Complaints and Disputes
part_10.text: Complaints must be submitted in writing as soon as possible and no later than 7 days after departure. In the event of a dispute, we aim to reach an amicable solution. Disputes that cannot be resolved through dialogue shall be handled by Sunnfjord District Court as the legal venue.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy and Cookies
privacyPage.intro: At Hov Hyttegrend, we take your privacy seriously. Below is a brief explanation of how we handle personal data and use cookies on our website.

part_1.title: Personal Data
part_1.text:
When you contact us, send an enquiry, or book a stay, we store information such as your name, email address, phone number, and booking details.
We use this information only to:
part_1.listItem1: Manage bookings and provide you with the best possible service
part_1.listItem2: Send necessary information about your stay
part_1.listItem3: Comply with legal requirements (for example, accounting obligations)

part_2.title: Sharing of Personal Data
part_2.text: We do not share personal data with third parties except where necessary to deliver our services, such as payment providers, accountants, or technical service partners. All our partners comply with GDPR and process data in a secure manner.

part_3.title: Storage and Deletion
part_3.text: Personal data is stored only for as long as necessary for its purpose or as required by law. You may request access to, correction of, or deletion of your personal data at any time by contacting us at post@hovhyttegrend.no

part_4.title: Cookies
part_4.text: We use cookies to provide a better experience on our website. Cookies help us to:
part_4.listItem2: Understand how the website is used (for statistics and improvement purposes)
part_4.text2: You can disable or limit the use of cookies in your browser settings. Please note that some website features may then function less optimally.
